turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order from Peet's Coffee. The Peet's I don't know where I think the closest one's on Fairfax.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me check for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what city and state are you in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i see one at gilmore station and one at moss plaza, are any of those close to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, at the plaza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will direct your order there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like Frappuccino with frosting or icing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i order that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it doesn't look like pete's does frappachino's would you like to order from starbucks instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, it's okay. I still want to go to Peet's. Just make the I want like a frosty type of a drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me look through their menu and recommend a few drinks to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to try the iced caffe mocha or the iced white chocolate mocha? they both have whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, the iced caffe. Yeah, the iced caffe mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like your iced caffe mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any milk with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I mean as a small skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me place that order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered a medium iced caffe mocha with non-fat milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the pete's at moss plaza, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee
